content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my house while looking up at the sky and i see in the northeastern sky what seemed to be the flying disco ball (this is what i call it because of the colors red, yellow, green, blue, and white) which are the colors it puts off while it's hovering and changing directions. i decided to use the zoom in + app that i downloaded from google play store to see if i could zoom in on it but instead, i saw the triangle formation. after taking a picture of that, i went inside and came back out 45 minutes later and tried again to video the "disco ball". it was far up in the sky but was in our atmosphere; i pressed record and zoomed in and that's when i saw the orbs. it was 2 white orbs that were side by side then appeared 3 red orbs in a triangle formation that were pulsating near the previous 2.
content.summary: Orb

content.detailedDescription: Night time flight of drone did not notice it then saw flash even thought that was just a light but upon review i was stunned to see it apprently travel east at unreal speed as it illumiates all that direction giving the effect of a flash this was about 3 20 am the location is from the strip headed east at a way to low altitude
content.summary: Watch video i missed it many times reviewed because theft occured in same area and drone was ay altitude of 50 to 100 ft thought it might have seen somthing

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting in my back yard when the orb came into sight. it looked as if someone shot a flair at first not as bright as a flair should be though. when it reached its maximum height of maybe 100-200 feet it then hovered across the road at a slow pace, then preceded to hover above us and into the distance.
content.summary: Medium sized red orb with a blinking white light underneath

content.detailedDescription: I live in a three story town house with a deck on the third story. i was standing outside on the deck when i saw an extremly bright white yellow light coming from the south east to the northwest i tracked it visually from the time i first noticed it to the time it went by my location to the northwest it took approximately  one and one half min to travel from one side of the sky to the other where it disappeared into a cloud bank and i never saw it emerge.
content.summary: Brightly glowing no blinking lights extremely bright  almost glaringly light gave the appearance of being  being high.

content.detailedDescription: At a cookout on the beach, assateague island. facing south hour or so after sunset. mars, saturn and antares form a loose triangle near the middle of the photo, lots of light pollution from the moon and it was still early. ocean, beach and some cars and campers lights in the distance at the bottom of the photo. in the upper right of the photo is the anomaly. i am submitting 2 photos with a blowup of one, these photos were taken ten minutes showing the anomaly in different parts of the sky. i have additional photos as well.
content.summary: I took a seris of photos on the beach looking south.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home alone toward rockford on plainfield rd in plainfield township near grand rapids mi when i noticed the whitish-blue star-like light traveling straight down from around 50 degrees up.
  from when i saw it until it disappeared behind tree line was about 3-4 seconds.  no trailing, pulsating, no sound noticed.
content.summary: Driving north on plainfield rd and seen a whitish/blue star-like light traveling slowly straight down and disappeared into tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my kitchen in the refridgerator and when. i came out to close the door there was a full body apparition standing behind the door. i became scared and worried that the entity would grab me or try to communicate as there have nern multiple acounts from different people to my home including myself that there has bern contact of voices, sightings even scratches and just plain pressnce of otherworldly kinds present here on multiple occasions. i came out of my kitchen and laid on my couch. i felt soneone staring or so ething and for some reason i looked up and saw a gold/copper colored floating head looking at me. this same head has been spotted multiple times by myself as this is now the second at least. i felt startled and scared but could not look away. i felt a feeling of beingvspied on or being notified that someone or something would return as if i was being contacted but not respinding which is common here with these apparitions appearing. there have been multiple cases of death and bad luck within my familt and friends cicle since the last time that i attempted to ignore my sightings and it seems to be getting worse as these sightings are becoming more frequent and are branching out to more disconnected visitors to my home. people who have never known of each otgers or my own experiences are reporting to me about a sightings or a presence being here. these entities only dissapeared upon my blinking and they vanished. i feel drained of my energy after each sighting as well as now since then two even more. i felt hot temperature wise before both sightings today and very dehydrated which is common before these and has not changed today as 28th at was why i went inyo fridge in the first place.
content.summary: No ufo sighted

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting took place on wednesday 20th july 2016 above the m1 motorway north of london uk, on a straight section of road ( from 510 58’ 54.27’’ north to 510 59’ 26.97’’ west ) at 15:20 bst       ( 14:20 gmt ) approximately. weather conditions were bright sunshine with a few scattered cumulus clouds.
i was returning home after a days work travelling north as i do every weekday. after passing through junction 12 on the m1 i continued on in light traffic. when the road curved around to the section i mention above i noticed what i thought was a light aircraft, although i could not make out any details it just seemed to be a white dot against the blue sky to left of the motorway high above and to the north of the trees. i was struck by the speed of the object that made me think it must be a high performance aircraft, which further tweaked my interest as i am a pilot and professional engineer in the aerospace industry.
i was startled when it pitched down into a dive at 45 degrees. my first reaction was that it was going to do some aerobatic manoeuvres and felt i wanted to see this and find out what type of aircraft it was. as i watched it descend i was looking for wings and a tail but could see none. it descended to just above the motorway and then appeared to be flying just above the motorway traffic approaching in my direction.  as it approached i realised it was circular and thought it must be a helicopter but could not see any rotors or other structures. when it passed the electricity pylon nearest to me on the right hand side of the road i could see it was a shiny silvery white sphere about 2 metres or 7 feet in diameter. it also had a yellow circular light at its centre. it then seemed to veer off towards the right hand side of the road descending and the last time i saw it it went behind the trees about 150 to 200 metres ahead on the right.  
i attach some slides i have made using images from google earth and street view to show the location, path lengths and my position on the motorway. the last slide i constructed to show what the object looked like. the duration of the sighting was about fifteen seconds. the wind direction was from the south west, in other words at right angles to the motorway and the path the object followed. i said to myself afterwards what was that? i was shocked.
content.summary: Daylight object in sky travelling west then dived, it then came towards me and i could see a spherical shape

content.detailedDescription: I was initially in my house and a co-worker of mine messaged me that he sees the phoenix lights in the southern sky. so i walked out into my driveway and turned south and immediately saw 3 lights initially and then a 4th appeared after a minute of two (i have seen them before and reported them before). they were same as before bright glowing floating orbs in the sky at a 30-35 degree angle. i knew they weren't air traffic because i saw one helicopter and numerous aircraft flying underneath the objects, so that told me that they were stationary.  the lights seemed to just turn off like every other time.  i am currently an aircraft mechanic at luke afb and i personally know the flying schedules of the aircraft and i can assure you that there were no planes from luke flying.
content.summary: Standing in driveway viewed the phoenix lights

content.detailedDescription: Travelling east on tenth st about 50ft from main noticed 2 yellow orbs slowly moving above the treetops from east to west.When about north of my position another followed in in the same tajectory.When they where north of me they banked and went north out of veiw,when at the end of tenth street 4 blocks down before i walked into the apt complex noticed two yellow orbs from east above tree tops then three more spaced farther behind, they alll went east then banked left followed by a military jet,
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Traveling east on 10th st about 50ft from main st crossing noticed 2 yellow orbs above treetops from east travilling in a southwest trojectory slowly and smoothly.When they go to the north of my oposition anothe yelloow orb came over the treetops an

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way back to my office when i looked out my window at a airliner that appeared to have a flock of birds around it after continuing watching i pulled over at a cemetery were a police unit was watching a ceremony i approached the two officers and we all three observed this very strange event for about 15-20 min then the police left puzzled i stayed and watch with two cemetery workers for about another 20 min.Then they just disappeared
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White balls 25-30 one or two would blink and then they would fade and appear in another location witnesses with two on duty police officers and three cemetary workers

content.detailedDescription:
Was in driveway.

10:18pm cst ~88f, very high humidity. clear.

 saw two lights that were where flights don't occur normally, and when they do, they are low coming in for landing and you can see the normally expected lights.  what was odd was that one seemed to speed up and then fall into lockstep with the one in the lead. speed: ~landing speed for a 737. best guess. we can always here the noise when the planes are there... but no sound. i guess the hair on my arms got standing. not from any known external influence. just a creepy factor. 

they got closer, guessing 1-1.5 miles at 3,000 feet? then turned to the nw and got steep and seemed to get high and dim quicker than i would have expected... and gone while more lights came from the e in roughly the same path. i won't use the word dancing, but it came to mind. i am wondering if this was a parallax distortion... the flight pattern was... just odd. then one light got lower to the trees from my perspective and i saw that it was a helo. moonlight... clear. no sound i was aware of. distance 1 mile? 

two of the next lights then turned nw, too, and flew up steeply. gone in 10 or secs. the fifth hovered. damn. but, from my angle, it stopped. hovered. guessing, 10-15 seconds.

then it appeared to go up vertically.Another 10 seconds and gone.

i had just come down to my office with the first beer. had a beer over mexican at 6pm. 

i am a ufo buff. i am an engineer. google me. and i am 100% expecting these to have been some airplane club ... or... i don't know. the perception of hovering is weird...

only saw one other unexplained. never reported.

so, i do expect to be told "it was clear air/hot air distortion. go to bed."

thanks.
content.summary: Saw lights from driveway... odd... so i watched,

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived to the store and was talking on my phone when i saw something floating stationairy. the object was black, round and somewhat reflective. there were several hot air balloons in the distance but the object i observed had no gondola and made no sound but was at least as big or bigger than the balloons. then myself and a stranger in the parking lot watched as the object began to move at a good clip in a straight line and then stop above us. it hovered above us for a while and then started to rise, turn direction, stop and then eventually slowly rise until no longer viable though a low flying passenger plane was.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Was defiantly not a hot air balloon or drone

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone today (referred by mufon hq: the witness and his fiancee and neighbors have been seeing unidentified objects in the skies for several months. 

the witness and  and his fiance were sitting on his deck on july 20, they saw two craft that faded out and then came back.  

the next day on the 21st he saw a very large glowing object and called to his fiance, it was a craft that was glowing, heading e to w very slowly at tree line, it was no further away than 10 miles away. it was a bright light, no sound, very quiet, suddenly took an s pattern then took off very quickly back to the se and out of sight. it would take a postcard to cover it up. it had no structure. it looked like three lit up points on it at 12, 2 and 10 o'clock. all of the objects they are seeing look similar. some blink, some are steady, some fade out. this one was shaped like a horseshoe with three lights on the front of it. appear at dusk or a little after.

recently he stayed up all night to watch one large object. he was near wal-mart, there was a huge craft over the store, 3 miles from him, 3-4 miles up, and it would take a volkswagon to cover it up. it was an odd shape, rounded, the back had corners on it, all white with yellow tint. very slight high pitched sound. his truck radio went out. it was static then quit.

some of the objects they have seen are multi-colored with white, orange, yellow, green, and blue lights. spinning motion, moves slightly, spins, moves again then back. he watched one when he was in kansas city in the north sky six months ago then it disappeared at sunrise. 

several months ago he reported a flying wing like a boomerang, he reported this to mufon. he saw three beings standing in the front windows, the heads were big, like stick people. could not tell what color they were. 7 fins equally spaced. floated very slowly. the craft was a yellow/green/black color. very smooth, dim lights on the front of each fin.    

when he lived in sheldon, mo he had a telescope and watched one object change shapes as an oval, triangle, and acorn shape with a honeycomb pattern on the bottom during the night 10 pm. 4 years ago. summertime. 


his fiance said that two nights ago she was sitting outside alone between 11 and 12 p.M. when something bright caught her eye to the ne, the object was the thickness of her pinky finger, it went suddenly to the ground and out of sight and did not return. the object was a white/yellow color. no trail behind it.  

both have been outside, watching objects on a nightly basis. they have been watching the skies for the past three months.
content.summary: Multiple fast-moving ufos in the sky over the past three months

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking video on my iphone in slow motion. i didn't see it when i was recording but it caught my eye when i played it back because it was moving so fast even in slow motion. when i zoomed in to look, i know it's not possible for it to be anything else, not at that speed. i don't recall any noise and no one in the video seems to notice anything either.  

on second play back, i also see it zip by near the beginning as well. i am not sure if it is one or two objects.  it comes from the left behind my kid and heads out towards the ocean...I think. 

i didn't notice it until i played back the video and my feeling is excitement. i mean, i want to cry a little because i have seen things before but have never been fortunate enough to finally have hard proof of something, whatever it is. 

oh!  also, i noticed when leaving that we were near the us coast guard but on the sign it also said department of homeland security which didn't mean anything to me until just now.  it's the building on the left. 

the first object is at the beginning while the video is still blurry while starting the slow motion process. the second one appears clear at about 1:48-1:49 into the video.
content.summary: On slow mo cam, it zipped past behind my kid faster than lightning.

content.detailedDescription:
At 1 am i went outside to take a leak, i thought a pic of my place at night would make a cool painting so i took a snap.
the weather was cool, overcast,dry with little wind, pitch black with no moonlight.
when i uploaded the pic i noticed this "object" above the roof to the left. this object has not appeared on any  previous pics.I didnt see it when i was taking the pic.I didnt hear any associated noises.
content.summary: I took a pic of my place didnt not see object until pic was uploaded to pc

content.detailedDescription: We were playing in friends yard next road over it was getting late in the evening so my friend was walking home with me and about half way there we look up togather at the craft then back at each other with the wtf look on our faces then take off running toward my house which took no longer than 10sec. we turn and look back up and it's gone with no noise and craft was about football field size perfect triangle hovering right above trees with a bunch of white lights running along the edge of 2 sides facing south and a bunch of red lights running down the northern facing side it was a dull grey color not black or shiny lights were on didnt blink there was no noise from craft but definitly scared us . ive seen my friend about 2yrs back and asked her if she remembered and she said yes so i dont feel crazy about it whether it be et or government.
content.summary: Ashley and i walking to my house we both look up see it look at each other in awe run bout 10sec look back its no longer there

content.detailedDescription: I walked from the house facing west i stopped and felt compelled to look up. the sky was unusual and there it stood. i asked myself is this just clouds like i have never seen before or a huge object with windows and floors stacked on top of each other like a huge triangular building or strange structure? it just hung there in the sky i took a picture of it and walked away. it was not until later when i looked at the picture again that i thought that this looked like a mother ship cloaked to look like cloud formations? (don't laugh) perhaps that is all that it is, clouds but i've never seen clouds in a triangular shape such as this in just one huge area.
content.summary: It was huge in size and seemed to be disguised as clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I went to myrtle beach with my family for a fun summer beach trip and we just left our hotel la quinta inn to go the the cherr grove fishing pier @ around 10:30. we got there and was having a blast seeing people catch fish,stingrays, and baby sharks. we were up on the top of the pier on the right side all the way in the front we all of a sudden a i seen 2 bright lights near the resorts on the beach. i told my parents about the lights and they said it may be drones so i agreed with that theory about 30 minutes later i seen a fireball type orb far out in the ocean and told my dad but it had already jusy vanished we waited and about a minute later m mom and dad seen it and they were both confused. the no longer than 2 minutes we seen 2 then 3 which then they just started duplicating but as one appered another would show up it was very cool but i was to confused on what just happened. youtube has a few videos like this ufo near myrtle beach and i think im not the only one who has seen this craft
content.summary: As 1 object a popped up another would disappear

content.detailedDescription:
I've witnessed this same ufo 3 times so far in a triangulate pattern of searching / scanning.
* the first time was in 8/30/2005 around 9pm when 100 yards from me it flashed those 2 red & i blue-white big lights at me, i was playing acoustic guitar on my balcony and sensed i was being watched, that's when i looked to my n.W and saw a 30-100 ft dark object hovering above a tree (tree-top). when we both synced it immediately began to flash it's lights at me for about 1-3 minutes... who knows what else was gonna happen after that because a relative of mine within the apt actually witnessed it from their own bedroom quarters window as well & came over to let me know about it, but i was already witnessing it, it was only at that moment the object went invisible to the human eye.

* the second time was in 12/24/2015 between 4-6 a.M, same as first time, felt compelled to get up & head out to my apts balcony on the 5th floor of my building. this time around though, i captured the sighting with my samsung cellphone camera from aprox 4 a.M to sunrise 6'ish a.M. it was as seen on the video s.E hovering & flashing it's lights about a mile away from me.

* the third time was in 7/19/2016 around 3 a.M. same as 2nd time of sighting i was sleeping, felt compelled to wake up & stepped outside into my balcony yet this time around it was 3 a.M and to my s.E the object was again hovering above the buildings in the horizon about 2 miles away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: This was second time i witnessed this ufo (theres a 3rd). i once again felt compelled to wake & get up from my bed & went outside to my apt's balcony on a 5th floor between 4a.M

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone today the primary witness stated that multiple witnesses are seeing different types of unidentified aerial objects in and around the town of belle, missouri in the past few months. 

the witness saw a small object this morning but we focused on a large close object he saw on sunday for this report. the witness noted a large disc-shaped dark object about the size of two school busses in length, moving very slowly, and passing directly over his house just above tree-top level. the object had 7 = 8 white lights in a circle on the bottom aiming down and one big white light in the center bottom. there were beams of light coming from the lights but the beams did not hit the ground or house. there was no sound at all, but there was a kind of hum in his ears that sounded like it was coming from inside his ears rather than from an outside source. 

the witness walked under the gutters and soffit in order to hide, but kept looking up and watched as the passed over head, wobbling slightly left to right, but keeping in a straight-line path. the witness called his girlfriend and she came outside as well and they both got photos on their cell phones. inside the house, prior to being called outside, his girlfriend and her children noticed that their phones started dialing and going off and on by themselves and wondered what was going on.

they lost sight of the object as it continued on its path and out of sight.  

_____________________________________

7- 22- 2016. 4:43 am this morning: the witness walked outside and saw a bright white light about the size of a water bottle cap held at arm's length. it was all white, had no structure and no sound. it came from south to north, traveled at slow speed, was wobbling, and had no radiant light, it was just a solid white light with no structure. it went to the opposite side of the house, then straight up and accelerated as it went up and out of sight very quickly. the witness did not have his phone with him then, he went into the house and came back and the object was gone. 
____________________________________

a number of times experiences everyone's phones will go off and on, the wifi may go in and out, in relation to a ufo going overhead. 

____________________________________

on feb 2, 2016 at 2:46 p.M.: he was outside helping his neighbor work on his car, when his girlfriend's phone started texting randomly and going on and off. she came outside to tell him what was going on and he looked up and saw cigar shaped silver object with white lights all the way around the center circumference, and some kind of a force field around it- it was directly over his house. he told his neighbor to look, and they both saw it as well as his girlfriend. the witness said that the object was size of a large cuban cigar held at arm's length to cover it up. the object was traveling west to southeast, towards town, and going very slowly, they watched it for several minutes and took several photos. there was no sound. 
______________________________________

the witness and his girlfriend have been having trouble with the electrical system on his car, seemingly related to when they see ufos.  the radio will keep changing stations, there is a lot of static, lights come of and on, gauges move. his battery has been replaced three times, he finally got a big diesel battery. when he drives out of the area the car does not have any problems. 
_____________________________________

he is a tattoo artist, and a lot of people have been coming in and talking about their own sightings, getting daytime photos of ufos and even their own abduction experiences. 

he talked to some of the police in town, several have talked about huge craft over the dollar general store five years ago - everyone knows about it in town. the police said they will take a report, listen to the witness, but not file a formal report. they get a lot of reports of ufos but don't know what to do with them or who to refer people to. 
_________________________________________

the primary witness does not remember being taken, however, he has seen ufos his entire life. when he was a kid driving with his father, they saw two tall beings standing next to a ufo in a field. when he was older he saw a triangle ufo at the eaglewood rv park while he was cleaning up the field. 

his girlfriend lived in owensville, mo on cherry street when she was younger. she a ufo with bright lights coming in the windows and missing time. saw her sister was in the light, and now has scarring and female problems. he has nightmares about being outside trying to get into the house. his girlfriend saw three beings in their house at an earlier event. 

_________________________________________

the witness stated that he contacted mufon out of desperation, he is concerened for his family and four children in the house.
content.summary: Many witnesses seeing multiple ufos for months throughout the entire town

content.detailedDescription:
On july 17th , at around 00:06-07 , we( my wife and i) were driving back home , and just couple of minutes before reaching home , we saw two clearly red ( clearly i said, because they stand out from anything else in the sky at that moment, very clear sky) , i then stopped at the side of the road , to make sure that these objects were moving or standing still, when stopped , we clearly could see that they were moving , very slowly ( to our eyes at least), 1 after the other, like they're on a patrol, the second seemed faster then the first one, but they were following a same path/line , just like ants would do, then at a certain point in the sky , the first object , faded or ,what my wife and i , agreed-upon , was absorbed into something,and then the first object kept the same path and did exactly the same thing at exactly the same point.
i'm a skeptic person , i don't trust my senses much , not until everything is clear, but what i saw that night , is an experience i'll hold dear as it was a real one, not sure, if it's aliens or not , didn't see proofs with my own eyes before, but ufo stands for unidentified flying object right, well what we saw , was objects that were flying and for us , unidentified (not a  plane , jet , air-balloon,satellite...)
content.summary: 2 red light moving together , disappeared at the same spot.

content.detailedDescription: My sister was out on the east 2nd story patio and saw a disc shaped cloud hovering over a vacant field across the street at approximately 12:30 pm. she had me come and look at it and i took photos and a video. the cloud held the oval shape for over a half hour. it was the only cloud in the blue desert sky. the edges of the cloud object appeared to be circulating. the cloud then disentigrated after a half hour. later that evening my sister received a news prompt on her telephone about ufo clouds that are appearing all over. we thought this was very coincidental since we just witnessed one.
content.summary: Ufo appeared as a cloud in the blue sky

content.detailedDescription: There was large flashes of light in the sky, very peculiar and very interesting. first it got really dark then these flashes of light appeared.
content.summary: Short bursts of light flashing rapidly when it was very dark.

content.detailedDescription:
I am from sri lanka.I am not fluent in english. this day i went to drop my daughter in a tuition class that starts at about 6:00 pm. this small village called "kosswatta". after dropped her i came back to go home and stopped at a small shop to by beetle ( in my village we have a habit of chewing beetle ). i took a pack and shared the stuff with the father of the owner of small shop. while we are talking about gem mines ( this person and my self are occasionally working in gem mines ), i did see a bright red,yellow, orange color changing object appears from northern sky. we both did see that but i was the first one did see. that object was coming towards us not in accurate horizontal line, but in a little angle that is easier to look at without turn our heads to horizontal line. the object was like  a small orange or golf ball. it was changing colors in bright red, orange, golden yellow. was traveling north to south in direct line at an unbelievable speed. it only took 7-10 seconds to cross the sky in first time and was above cloud level.The area had good sight of sky (not to see 180° degrees but near 120° degrees). we both was talking what could go in that speed ? that was disappeared in southern sky. we was talking about this and was looking at south. after near five minutes we did see the object in the same place that was disappeared in south. but little smaller than before because now the object was traveling higher than before. took only 10 seconds to cross the sky to reach same place of north. we whispered and i was counting one to ten as how the clock running in seconds. then we are waiting while looking at north for 5-7 minutes or 10 minutes. then the object appeared aginbin nort and was small as a lime. i was counting to 15 when it reach south and disappeared in same place in south. also another 3 people joined us from the second sighting. as we think any aircraft can't reach that speed to cross a large area of sky over clouds. we have seen jets and kufeer fighter crafts but have a great noise but not moving at this speed in this much above in sky.
this is not my first time seeing these things. i was 7 year old boy when i got my first experience. was 8:00 pm at colombo. a white octagonal object with triangular shaped on it and glowing with a nice orange light around it. but can't find where the light comes from. just like the object reflecting a light comes from nowhere.
then before 20 years i was securing my paddy fields. i think the month was december or november. i was with my shot gun and laying on a large flat granite rock. i could see the clear sky. i was listening carefully about wild boars. at about 2.00 am i did see a set of lights arranged as a triangle and was at accurate horizontal line when i was laying i could see directly above. these three lights are became larger than before but took 15-20 minutes. they looks like landing or decrease height. they were changing colors green to blue and white. all lights got same color in same time. and was below the clouds. after getting enlarged to a size of a 3feet × 3 triangle. it was started to blink these three lights and was showing an accurate triangle object with three lights on corners. then the triangle disappeared but the lights still blinking. then the lights got double there power and went to horizon in a great speed. and now that was a three inch triangle and disappeared. whole time was about 25-40 minutes.
in 2003 or a nearly year i was going home with my daughter after bringing her to a doctor because she was suffering from flue. i was riding my motor bike, my little daughter was sitting on the petrol tank. i was riding at 50 km \h. after passing the kalawana town there is a large paddy field. you can see a large area of the sky from your both sides of the road. i started to speedup because rad is straight and clear from vehicles. just i saw something is passing me from my left hand side. a nice large green light a papaya fruit shaped glowing light flying ower paddy fields parallel with me i was looking at this and wanted to check the speed. i accelerated to 85 km/h but that object shooting just in a second. i need to see where this thing going and started to follow as possible. but i lost the site because the area of paddy fields are passed. i reached to wembiyagoda junction and did see two people looking at the sky. i asked did you see something? they said yes, a large green light.I asked what could be that was. they said that is a devathaa elya (gods light ) sri lankan villagers using this name to introduce these flying things. also i had seen may things like this but can't explain what are these. but these things are helping people in uncommon ways.If you started to see them then they are always visible to you. these things can inform you about emergency incidents.I make notes when seeing these. my diary page about two sightings below. thank you.
content.summary: This came from north and went south, went back to north and then went to north and disappeared. sky was opened to naked eyes about to see 120° degrees. one travel only took 10-15 seconds. every time it sighted higher than before height.

content.detailedDescription: I'm not actually sure if it's a ufo. seen what i thought were 2 stars side by side moving slowly toward a different star. suddenly they went opposite direction and moved very quickly. one moved faster then the other after change in direction. no noise and to high to be a chopper. moved to fast and didnt turn, just went the other direction. no trails. lost faster one in big dipper. slower one i lost before that. i feel a bit crazy writing this but want a lociacal expanation. tried filming on my phone but phone is shitd
content.summary: They just looked like stars

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with a family member back to their apartment while i was occasionally looking at the stars. i noticed a fast moving object in the sky and we both looked at it firstly as it was in almost the midpoint of the sky. it was moving quickly so i thought it was the international space station but it was not a small non-blinking light. it was moving quickly across the sky heading west i think with dim/blurry lights that were pulsing/blinking in probably the hind part of the craft. it was changing direction slightly but noticeably so that is why i think it was not the international space station. i felt very excited and shocked because i have never witnessed an occurrence like this before. i am also an aviation enthusiast so i can definitely say that it was not a human-made aircraft.
content.summary: Fast slight changing direction with pulsating random four or number of flashing lights at early dark night

content.detailedDescription: Driving in the car. the noticed a glowing object coming toward our direction. it passed directly over our heads and saw a glowing fireball underneath a triangular ship.There where 3 of us in the car that witnessed it as well as a man and a woman out on the street. we yelled out to them during the event to see if they saw it as well. they confirmed it as well as remarking there was no noise associated with it.
content.summary: Driving in the car. the noticed a glowing object coming toward our direction. it passed directly over our heads and saw a glowing fireball underneath a triangular ship.

content.detailedDescription: I observed this event and many others like it within the past 3 or 4 months. i live and work in altoona pa. my work and my home are only about a mile apart, and in that general vicinity is where i see these events occur. the first time i noticed this, was roughly 4 months prior to now. naturally i figured it was a random occurance. however, in the hours, and days that followed the first of these sightings, i couldnt shake the feeling that i was supposed to have witnessed it. it started to almost consume me emotionally, so i started dedicating an hour or so each night after work (generally between 11pm and 3am) surveying the night sky.  as long as the weather cooperated, i would watch.  as weeks went by, i saw nothing unusual. i started to notice my girlfriend of 6 years looking at me weird and questioning my mental stability, hahaha. you could safely say she is skeptical. not only of what i saw but of me in general. ..Anyhow..Like 4 or 5 weeks later, i was treated to an amazing display of aerial phenomenon.  same type stuff as the first time, but it lasted much longer. a single light source sometimes stationary, sometimes in motion, dispensed then collected smaller light sources. i imagine these were indeed some type of physical bodies (craft, disc, etc.) however i cant say positively i saw any material substance behind these lights.  in all i witnessed these events no less than 5 times. all seperate occasions. last night was the 5th or 6th time.  in closing, i must say that i wouldnt believe this if i hadnt experienced it myself. not that i would question a sighting such as these, as i would the amount of similair sightings in a somewhat short period of time. ive known this was real since a sighting i had in 99, but now i know it exists on a much different level. i feel like ive truly been emotionally moved. thanks for your time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Intelligently controlled lights,(crafts) moving in non traditional flight patterns, sometimes omitting other small ones

content.detailedDescription: I was going to lunch at the olive garden at the pittsburgh mills. when pulling in saw a fast moving triangle shaped silver object moving a great speed from ne to sw and it was seen for about 20 seconds, the radio did have some interference not significant but was noticeable and the object was gone for about 5 minutes, and while i was smoking a cigarette outside before going inside to sit down and order. the object was seen traveling from nw to se and saw it for about 15 seconds or so, the object had to been traveling atleast mach 1 or 2
content.summary: A quick moving silver metallic triangle spotted moving a great speed near pittsburgh mills
